org.apache.flink.runtime.blob

类 BlobClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.blob.BlobClient
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class BlobClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    The BLOB client can communicate with the BLOB server and either upload (PUT), download (GET), or delete (DELETE) BLOBs.

    • 字段概要

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BlobClient

        public BlobClient(java.net.InetSocketAddress serverAddress,
                  Configuration clientConfig)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Instantiates a new BLOB client.
        参数:
        serverAddress - the network address of the BLOB server
        clientConfig - additional configuration like SSL parameters required to connect to the blob server
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if the connection to the BLOB server could not be established

    • 方法详细资料

      • downloadFromBlobServer

        static void downloadFromBlobServer(@Nullable
                                   JobID jobId,
                                   BlobKey blobKey,
                                   java.io.File localJarFile,
                                   java.net.InetSocketAddress serverAddress,
                                   Configuration blobClientConfig,
                                   int numFetchRetries)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Downloads the given BLOB from the given server and stores its contents to a (local) file.

        Transient BLOB files are deleted after a successful copy of the server's data into the given localJarFile.

        参数:
        jobId - job ID the BLOB belongs to or null if job-unrelated
        blobKey - BLOB key
        localJarFile - the local file to write to
        serverAddress - address of the server to download from
        blobClientConfig - client configuration for the connection
        numFetchRetries - number of retries before failing
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the download

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.io.Closeable
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.lang.AutoCloseable
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • isClosed

        public boolean isClosed()

      • getInternal

        java.io.InputStream getInternal(@Nullable
                                JobID jobId,
                                BlobKey blobKey)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Downloads the BLOB identified by the given BLOB key from the BLOB server.
        参数:
        jobId - ID of the job this blob belongs to (or null if job-unrelated)
        blobKey - blob key associated with the requested file
        返回:
        an input stream to read the retrieved data from
        抛出:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if there is no such file;
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the download

      • sendGetHeader

        private static void sendGetHeader(java.io.OutputStream outputStream,
                                  @Nullable
                                  JobID jobId,
                                  BlobKey blobKey)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs and writes the header data for a GET operation to the given output stream.
        参数:
        outputStream - the output stream to write the header data to
        jobId - ID of the job this blob belongs to (or null if job-unrelated)
        blobKey - blob key associated with the requested file
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if an I/O error occurs while writing the header data to the output stream

      • receiveAndCheckGetResponse

        private static void receiveAndCheckGetResponse(java.io.InputStream is)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the response from the input stream and throws in case of errors.
        参数:
        is - stream to read from
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if the response is an error or reading the response failed

      • putBuffer

        BlobKey putBuffer(@Nullable
                  JobID jobId,
                  byte[] value,
                  int offset,
                  int len,
                  BlobKey.BlobType blobType)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Uploads data from the given byte buffer to the BLOB server.
        参数:
        jobId - the ID of the job the BLOB belongs to (or null if job-unrelated)
        value - the buffer to read the data from
        offset - the read offset within the buffer
        len - the number of bytes to read from the buffer
        blobType - whether the BLOB should become permanent or transient
        返回:
        the computed BLOB key of the uploaded BLOB
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if an I/O error occurs while uploading the data to the BLOB server

      • putInputStream

        BlobKey putInputStream(@Nullable
                       JobID jobId,
                       java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                       BlobKey.BlobType blobType)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Uploads data from the given input stream to the BLOB server.
        参数:
        jobId - the ID of the job the BLOB belongs to (or null if job-unrelated)
        inputStream - the input stream to read the data from
        blobType - whether the BLOB should become permanent or transient
        返回:
        the computed BLOB key of the uploaded BLOB
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if an I/O error occurs while uploading the data to the BLOB server

      • sendPutHeader

        private static void sendPutHeader(java.io.OutputStream outputStream,
                                  @Nullable
                                  JobID jobId,
                                  BlobKey.BlobType blobType)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs and writes the header data for a PUT request to the given output stream.
        参数:
        outputStream - the output stream to write the PUT header data to
        jobId - the ID of job the BLOB belongs to (or null if job-unrelated)
        blobType - whether the BLOB should become permanent or transient
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if an I/O error occurs while writing the header data to the output stream

      • receiveAndCheckPutResponse

        private static BlobKey receiveAndCheckPutResponse(java.io.InputStream is,
                                                  java.security.MessageDigest md,
                                                  BlobKey.BlobType blobType)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the response from the input stream and throws in case of errors.
        参数:
        is - stream to read from
        md - message digest to check the response against
        blobType - whether the BLOB should be permanent or transient
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if the response is an error, the message digest does not match or reading the response failed

      • uploadJarFiles

        public static java.util.List<PermanentBlobKey> uploadJarFiles(java.net.InetSocketAddress serverAddress,
                                                              Configuration clientConfig,
                                                              JobID jobId,
                                                              java.util.List<Path> jars)
                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Uploads the JAR files to the PermanentBlobService of the BlobServer at the given address with HA as configured.
        参数:
        serverAddress - Server address of the BlobServer
        clientConfig - Any additional configuration for the blob client
        jobId - ID of the job this blob belongs to (or null if job-unrelated)
        jars - List of JAR files to upload
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if the upload fails

                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
